column4: Last night I started an upgrade to 10.10 from 10.04 before going to bed. This morning I looked at the screen and it looks like the window manager got shut down, I see the windows, but no title bars. As a result, I can't switch to a prompt window to continue the upgrade.
can you try going to ctrl-alt-F1 and then ctrl-alt-F7 maybe it will revive itself that has worked for me before
I've been doing that. For some reason xterm will open, but I can't type in it.  So i had to go to another console and write a simple script to start matacity, which fails.
sorry, I am really quite the noob myself. Not sure how to help you.
